author: Eric Siebert
comment: I like it but there is no option to keep the color setting in Ambient mode

author: Chipper Ellingson
comment: Beautiful design. I changed my setting to always on just so I could keep looking at it. Sweet layout. I know it would ruin the minimalistic design to add date but it doesn't have to. I fill out a lot of paperwork at my job and am constantly checking the date so I don't screw up forms.  P.S. works flawlessly on a Moto 360 2nd gen.  -Great Design.

author: Michael Rebar
comment: The first couple of times I looked at this face, I struggled to count the dashes. Literally, about an hour later, I casually (quickly) glanced at the face and knew what time it was. Right after I looked away, I had a WTF moment as it dawned on me that I didn't have to think at all. An amazingly intuitive design!  I do find one thing a little annoying, which cost the app a star: even right after reboot (no apps running), it often stutters on wake, taking a sec to update the time (moto360 1st gen).

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank you - you are probably first one who "get it" as I designed it. Check others model and have a great TTMM.

title: The trick is to NOT think so hard...

author: Corey Ogburn
comment: Takes a little getting used to but I love it! Low battery usage, clean design. Love it. I do have an idea I'd like to see... What if I could choose between the segments being lines or hexagons? I'd love to see that!

author: Aaron Whipkey
comment: Took me a while to figure it out (I'm not the fastest thinker) but i finally got it and bought this....great way to tell the time....doesn't have any other features besides time, could maybe use the corners for like stats and weather (on square watches)

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank you. Anything more will spoil the design. I will think about design with more information - like date, weather etc.

title: Awesome

author: Jonny Spence
comment: Love the design, takes a few seconds to read, but I don't mind this at all. It would be great to have more colour options and background options to choose from.

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank You. I will consider other color options. Check other design https://timesapp.eu

title: Minimal

author: Ruslan Sendecky
comment: One star is left out for the missing date. Yes, it is something to think about...
title: Love it )

author: Chimponzi Srivastava
comment: Got it to work finally. Looks decent. Minimalistic and mystical

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank you. Now you are in the vanguard of the other. Have a new TTMM.

title: It looks decent

author: Cullen Kwiatkowski
comment: How do I change the colors? I have an Asus zen watch

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: To change watch face color - go to Wear App tap specific watch face icon and you will get access to color setup. Any problems - write to me directly - I will help

title: It's cool but

author: Eshaan Mathur
comment: It may take a few minutes to learn how to read time.

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank you. This model Won Golden A Design Award.

title: A good minimal watch face

author: Michael Riley
comment: I downloaded it but find it my watch yet.
title: Looks cool

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Would like an option to add the day and date.

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thanks. Other options will ruin clean design > check TTMMSTYLUS

title: Sleek

author: M3S
comment: I really like the minimalistic creativity in this design
title: Really like it!

author: Tony Queue
comment: But how do i chan the color?

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content:
Hi, thank you. 

In Wear APP - tap TTMMINUS icon twice - setup should open on you phone. Any problems - write to me. 

Best,
Albert

title: Very nice

author: Ryan Shipe
comment: The watch face seems too small on moto 360 2; almost as if it's designed for a square watch and just doesn't scale well to a round screen. Harder to read because of size and there is tons of wasted screen space. Would purchase again if that was fixed.
title: Cool idea and looks neat, but
